title: This braum
body: Brought grasp of the undying as support and wondered why I kept dieing while he was flaming me under tower using no abilities. This community is great.

replies.body: Grasp is actually great on tank supports in extended fights. don't flame the mastery

its ok ... bond of stone ideally on tank supports who are in the of the shit * some might say * could be consider stronger by indirectly buffing the tankiness of his teammates by reducing their damage passively.

To say this in the least offensive way possible.  Complaining about your teammates and/or the community on the forums hurts the community and how other people view the League player base more than it helps.  Spread positiveness, not negativity!  You'll enjoy the game more if you look for times when people are doing something right or good, compared to the alternatives.  :)

man dont you know its never their fault its aalways teammates... like here its the supports fault, and if its not the supports its junglers and not junglers then its lag... 

problem i have is i main support so i guess its always my fault
Support is more important in bot lane than adc, riot hates adc.

> [{quoted}](name=Itankyou,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KipW7OL6,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-09-09T19:00:04.125+0000)
>
> Support is more important in bot lane than adc, riot hates adc.

I wouldn't say one is more important than the other, they both play a vital role.  And at the same time they wouldn't be anywhere without each other.

hmm apparently you dont read. or gather context. i am blaming me as the support.

Grasp on support tanks isn't bad, he's just a terrible braum.
gonna have to agree with you there.
